name: Plinko
description:
This is the best plinko game on iPhone/iPad!

In this plinko game, you can win tons of chips by lighting up all the slots. You can win up to 100 times of chips by a single shot!

There're several FREE plinko tables in this game, each with different play and different theme. If you like plinko game, you'll definitely like this game!

FEATURES:

* FREE plinko tables: all tables are freely available for you
* fast game play: you can throw up to 10 balls at a single move
* tons of bonuses: many bonuses help you to win bigger
* new tables with new features: every new table has some new features waiting for you to discovery

Download it now and enjoy this branding new Plinko game!
